original_text: And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.
korean_text: 이 무리가 다윗을 도와 도둑 떼를 쳤으니 그들은 다 큰 용사요 군대 지휘관이 됨이었더라

sentences.original_text: against the band of the rovers
for they were all mighty men of valour
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 다 용맹한 장사들이었기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: and were captains in the host
